price: 69. Nabii Muusa lYallih idnih kok ableemil yasbire numuh yoo geettooh yoo elle amrissi hayte caagid kok mačina kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرٗا وَلَآ أَعۡصِي لَكَ أَمۡرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla satajidunī in shāa al-lahu ṣābiran walā aʿṣī laka amran
